item.title: Github加速访问技巧
item.description: git 走 http 协议时， 设置 git config –global http.https://github.com.proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1086, 效果如下：确实快了 git clone https://github.com/micro/go-micro.git Cloning into 'go-micro'... remote: Enumerating objects: 67, done. remote: Counting objects: 100% (67/67), done. remote: Compressing objects: 100% (57/57), done. remote: Total 12415 (delta 16), reused 31 (delta 8), pack-reused 12348 Receiving objects: 100% (12415/12415), 3.27 MiB | 355.00 KiB/s, done. Resolving deltas: 100%
